credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Border
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, discontinuous tape
description: Border with a repeat pattern of three large rounded pendants. In each, a central motif is comprised of a grotesque human figure surmounted by a vase with a rising, foliated spray. Flanking the central motif are birds in flight, animals and peacocks. Each pendant is framed by a border of stylized floral forms.
name: Border
